metadata.description: Azure Content Delivery Network (CDN) lets you reduce load times, save bandwidth, and speed responsiveness.
The speed of the database (the number depects the number of vCPU's).
Set to false if you would like the Clevva software to update automatically
Name of the storage account you would like to create
Enter an email address to be used to login to the App
Base name of the resource such as Clevva-Web-App.
